content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can find information regarding the Corporate Security Policies at \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://ephubudvsd0087.budapest.epam.com/pal/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Process Asset Library (PAL)\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" which contains approved standards, processes descriptions, guidelines, sample documents and templates for managing, developing and maintaining software applications, databases and documentation.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you have any questions about the Company's Corporate Security Policies, direct them to your manager or mentor.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
